Public MustInherit Class BaseRequiredDescendantOfValidator Inherits ActivityValidator

Docs.summary: Provides the class with a validator that can be used to check for and prevent invalid input values and also to prevent potential unhandled exceptions.

remarks.para: The class is a sealed class and cannot be inherited or overridden.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection Validate (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager manager, object obj);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection Validate(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager manager, object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Validate (manager As ValidationManager, obj As Object) As ValidationErrorCollection

Docs.param: A ValidationManager object that contains contextual information such as property validation, parent and child activity relationships, and so on.
The workflow activity that must be validated.
Docs.summary: Verifies that the specified activity is valid.
Docs.returns: Returns a object that contains a collection of ValidationError objects.

remarks.para: Enforces the code rules that govern the workflow activity that is being validated.
